text: Oluwarotimi Odunayo Akeredolu (July 21, 1956 - December 27, 2023), simply known as Rotimi Akeredolu was a Nigerian lawyer and politician. He was the former executive governor of Ondo State from 2017 until his death in 2023 as a result of cancer, according to the BBC. He was considered a fighter and was described by Bola Tinubu as "a fearless defender who had fought for the masses" in a tribute. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Nigerian politicians Category:Nigerian lawyers Category:People from Ondo State
title: Rotimi Akeredolu
